column5: RCL said new travel restrictions barring cruise liners from Cuban destinations will likely lower its projected nonGAAP FY19 earnings outlook by 025035 per share compared with its prior guidance between 965985 per share vs analyst est of 984Royal Caribbean also said it changed the itineraries for cruises leaving Wednesday and Thursday and was reviewing alternate destinations for future departures adding it may need to compensate customers for changing their ports of call It said while cruises landing in Cuba only represented about 3 of its capacity Havana was a particularly high yielding destination amplifying its potential effect on earnings
